name: word
trans: n. [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令 vt. 用言辞表达 n. (Word)人名；(英)沃德

sentences.english: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.chinese: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.english: What does that word mean?
sentences.chinese: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.english: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.chinese: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.english: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.chinese: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

detailed_translations.chinese: [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令
detailed_translations.english: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
to use words that are carefully chosen in order to express something

name: animal
trans: n. 动物 动物的

sentences.english: furry little animals
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的小动物

sentences.english: The cosmetics have not been tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 这些化妆品没有进行过动物试验。

sentences.english: Beth is an animal lover (=  someone who likes animals  ) .
sentences.chinese: 贝丝是个喜欢动物的人。

detailed_translations.english: a living creature such as a dog or cat, that is not an insect, plant, bird, fish, or person
human feelings, desires etc that are connected with sex, food, and other basic needs

name: cow
trans: n. 奶牛，母牛；母兽 vt. 威胁，恐吓

sentences.english: Our cow is carrying again.
sentences.chinese: 我家的母牛又怀胎了。

sentences.english: The cow is expected to calve next week.
sentences.chinese: 这头母牛预期下周生小牛。

sentences.english: The cow cast a calf.
sentences.chinese: 这头母牛早产了。

detailed_translations.english: a large female animal that is kept on farms and used to produce milk or meat

name: duck
trans: n. 鸭子；鸭肉；（英）宝贝儿；零分 vi. 闪避；没入水中 vt. 躲避；猛按…入水 n. (Duck)人名；(德、葡、匈)杜克

sentences.english: If she hadn’t ducked, the ball would have hit her.
sentences.chinese: 如果她没有弯腰躲闪的话，那个球就可能击中她了。

sentences.english: Tim ducked down to comb his hair in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆低下身在镜子前梳头发。

sentences.english: She ducked her head to look more closely at the inscription.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头更仔细地看碑文。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸭子似的突然扎入水中； 突然低下
detailed_translations.english: to lower your head or body very quickly, especially to avoid being seen or hit
a very common water bird with short legs and a wide beak, used for its meat, eggs, and soft feathers

name: goat
trans: n. 山羊；替罪羊（美俚）；色鬼（美俚）

sentences.english: The tiger sprang on the goat.
sentences.chinese: 老虎向山羊扑去。

sentences.english: The goat bunted the calf.
sentences.chinese: 山羊用角抵小牛。

sentences.english: They staked the goat in the back yard.
sentences.chinese: 他们把山羊拴在后院的木桩上。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that has horns on top of its head and long hair under its chin, and can climb steep hills and rocks. Goats live wild in the mountains or are kept as farm animals.

name: pig
trans: n. 猪；猪肉 vi. 生小猪；像猪一样过活 n. 警察（俚语，带有攻击性）

sentences.english: He kept pigs and poultry.
sentences.chinese: 他养过猪和家禽。

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal with short legs, a fat body and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes  pork  ,  bacon  and  ham  .

name: sheep
trans: n. 羊，绵羊；胆小鬼

sentences.english: Sheep were grazing on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 羊群在山坡上吃草。

sentences.english: a sheep farmer
sentences.chinese: 养羊的农民

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal that is kept for its wool and its meat

name: boot
trans: n. 靴子；踢；汽车行李箱；解雇；车轮夹锁；再者 v. 踢；启动；在车轮上装制动装置；解雇；（使）穿靴；锁住（非法停车的轮子） n. (Boot) （美、英、荷、加、德、意、俄）布特（人名）

sentences.english: hiking boots
sentences.chinese: 远足靴

sentences.english: a pair of boots
sentences.chinese: 一双靴子

detailed_translations.english: a type of shoe that covers your whole foot and the lower part of your leg

name: mask
trans: n. 面具；口罩；掩饰 vi. 掩饰；戴面具；化装 vt. 掩饰；戴面具；使模糊

sentences.english: a surgical face mask
sentences.chinese: 外科手术口罩

sentences.english: He was attacked and robbed by two people wearing masks .
sentences.chinese: 他被两个蒙面人袭击并抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: something that covers all or part of your face, to protect or to hide it
if a smell, taste, sound etc is masked by a stronger one, it cannot be noticed because of the stronger one

name: scarf
trans: n. 围巾；嵌接，嵌接处；头巾领巾 vt. 披嵌接；用围巾围 n. (Scarf)人名；(英)斯卡夫 [ 复数 scarfs或scarves ]

sentences.english: Hey, your scarf is slipping off.
sentences.chinese: 喂， 你的围巾快掉了。

sentences.english: The scarf flapped her face.
sentences.chinese: 围巾轻拂着她的脸。

sentences.english: She muffled her throat with a scarf.
sentences.chinese: 她用围巾围住脖子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you wear around your neck, head, or shoulders, especially to keep warm

name: sunglasses
trans: n. 太阳镜；凸透镜（sunglass的复数）

sentences.english: What do you think of my new sunglasses?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得我的新太阳镜怎么样？

sentences.english: What color should I choose for my sunglasses?
sentences.chinese: 我该挑一副什么颜色的太阳镜呢？

sentences.english: I can’t see her eyes, but I can see her eyebrows above the sunglasses.
sentences.chinese: 我看不到她的眼睛，但是能看到她露在太阳镜上面的眉毛。

detailed_translations.english: dark glasses that you wear to protect your eyes when the sun is very bright

name: sweater
trans: n. 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂

sentences.english: Somebody pinched my sweater.
sentences.chinese: 有人偷了我的运动衫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂
detailed_translations.english: a piece of warm wool or cotton clothing with long sleeves, which covers the top half of your body

name: blanket
trans: n. 毛毯，毯子；毯状物，覆盖层 adj. 总括的，全体的；没有限制的 vt. 覆盖，掩盖；用毯覆盖

sentences.english: She huddled herself in the blanket.
sentences.chinese: 她用毯子紧紧裹住自己。

sentences.english: They muffled up her head with a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他们用毯子蒙住了她的头。

sentences.english: He lapped his daughter in a warm blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他把女儿裹在一个暖和的毯子里。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for a bed, usually made of wool

name: fort
trans: n. 堡垒；要塞；（美）边界贸易站 vt. 设要塞保卫 vi. 构筑要塞 n. (Fort)人名；(法)福尔；(德、英、西、葡、匈)福特

sentences.english: The fort flanked on a swamp.
sentences.chinese: 堡垒侧面靠着沼泽。

detailed_translations.english: a strong building or group of buildings used by soldiers or an army for defending an important place

name: friend
trans: n. 朋友；助手；赞助者 n. (Friend)人名；(英)弗兰德

sentences.english: Jerry, this is my friend Sue.
sentences.chinese: 杰里，这是我的朋友休。

sentences.english: She’s always out with her friends.
sentences.chinese: 她常同朋友们一起出去。

sentences.english: One of her closest friends died at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她的一位密友周末过世了。

sentences.english: I met Jim through a friend.
sentences.chinese: 经一位朋友介绍，我认识了吉姆。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you know and like very much and enjoy spending time with

name: game
trans: n. 游戏；比赛；猎物 adj. 勇敢的 vi. 赌博 n. (Game)人名；(英)盖姆；(法)加姆；(西)加梅

sentences.english: The boys were playing a game in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.english: game birds
sentences.chinese: 被捕猎的鸟

detailed_translations.english: an activity or sport in which people compete with each other according to agreed rules

name: pillow
trans: n. 枕头 vt. 垫；枕于…；使…靠在 vi. 枕着头；靠在枕上 n. (Pillow)人名；(英)皮洛

sentences.english: I’ll be asleep as soon as my head hits the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 我头一碰到枕头就会睡着。

detailed_translations.english: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put your head on when you are sleeping
to rest your head somewhere

name: bean
trans: n. 豆；嘴峰；毫无价值的东西 vt. 击…的头部 n. (Bean)人名；(英)比恩

sentences.english: baked beans
sentences.chinese: 烘豆

sentences.english: Soak the beans overnight.
sentences.chinese: 把豆子浸泡一夜。

sentences.english: kidney beans
sentences.chinese: 芸豆

sentences.english: green beans
sentences.chinese: 青刀豆，四季豆

detailed_translations.chinese: 豆；嘴峰；毫无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: a seed or a  pod (=  case containing seeds  )  , that comes from a climbing plant and is cooked as food. There are very many types of beans.
to hit someone on the head with an object

name: corn
trans: n. （美）玉米；（英）谷物；[皮肤] 鸡眼 vt. 腌；使成颗粒 n. (Corn)人名；(英、法、瑞典)科恩

sentences.english: fields of corn
sentences.chinese: 一片片麦田

sentences.english: an ear of corn
sentences.chinese: 谷穗

detailed_translations.english: plants such as wheat,  barley  , and  oats  or their seeds

name: garden
trans: n. 花园；菜园 vt. 栽培花木 vi. 从事园艺；在园中种植 n. (Garden)人名；(英、意、巴基)加登

sentences.english: He’s outside in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他在外面花园里。

sentences.english: Grace brought us some flowers from her garden.
sentences.chinese: 格雷丝给我们送来一些她花园里的花。

sentences.english: the botanical gardens in Edinburgh
sentences.chinese: 爱丁堡的植物园

detailed_translations.english: piece of land next to or around your house where you can grow flowers, fruit, vegetables, etc., usually with an area of grass(called a lawn )

name: melon
trans: n. 瓜；甜瓜；大肚子；圆鼓鼓像瓜似的东西 n. (Melon)人名；(意、西、葡)梅隆

sentences.english: ...some juicy slices of melon.
sentences.chinese: …几片多汁的甜瓜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瓜；甜瓜；大肚子；圆鼓鼓像瓜似的东西
detailed_translations.english: a large round fruit with sweet juicy flesh

name: onion
trans: n. 洋葱；洋葱头

sentences.english: Chop the onions finely.
sentences.chinese: 把洋葱切碎。

sentences.english: red onions
sentences.chinese: 红皮洋葱

sentences.english: home-made onion soup
sentences.chinese: 自制的洋葱汤

detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or white skin and many layers. Onions have a strong taste and smell.

name: peas
trans: n. [作物] 豌豆（pea的复数）

name: potato
trans: n. [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯

sentences.english: Marie stood at the sink, peeling potatoes (= cutting off the skin ) .
sentences.chinese: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

detailed_translations.chinese: [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯
detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or pale yellow skin, that grows under the ground

name: tomato
trans: n. 番茄，西红柿

sentences.english: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.english: Secondly,put some tomato paste on the bread.
sentences.chinese: 第二，放一些西红柿在面包上粘贴。

sentences.english: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

detailed_translations.english: a round soft red fruit eaten raw or cooked as a vegetable

name: cat
trans: n. 猫，猫科动物

sentences.english: The police played an elaborate game of cat and mouse to trap him.
sentences.chinese: 警方跟他玩了一场精心布局的猫捉老鼠游戏，诱他落网。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal with four legs that people often keep as a pet

name: go
trans: vi. 走；达到；运转；趋于 n. 去；进行；尝试 vt. 忍受；出产；以……打赌

sentences.english: The plate went crashing to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声掉在地板上。

sentences.english: The bullet went flying over my head.
sentences.chinese: 子弹从我头顶飞过。

sentences.english: John went rushing off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 约翰沿走廊飞奔而去。

sentences.english: Her hair is starting to go grey.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发开始变白了。

detailed_translations.english: to move in a particular way, or to do something as you are moving

name: dream
trans: n. 睡梦；梦想，愿望；恍惚；极美好的人（或事物）；幻想；梦境般的事 v. 做梦，梦见；梦想；虚度光阴；想到；开小差；想象 adj. 理想的，完美的

sentences.english: I had lots of dreams last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我做了很多梦。

sentences.english: Her dream is to make a movie.
sentences.chinese: 她的梦想是要拍一部电影。

sentences.english: It’s quite common to dream that you’re falling.
sentences.chinese: 梦到自己坠落是常有的事。

detailed_translations.english: a series of thoughts, images, and feelings that you experience when you are asleep
to have a dream while you are asleep

name: kiss
trans: v. 吻，接吻；（风等）轻拂，轻触；（球）轻轻擦过（另一球） n. 吻；（风等）轻拂；（一球与另一球）轻擦；小甜酥饼 n. (Kiss) （匈牙利、美、罗马尼亚）基什（人名）

sentences.english: Maggie leaned forward and kissed her cheek.
sentences.chinese: 玛吉俯身吻了她的脸颊。

sentences.english: Georgina took him in her arms and kissed him on the lips.
sentences.chinese: 乔治娜抱住他，吻他的嘴唇。

sentences.english: Jim and Mary kissed (= they kissed each other ).
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和玛丽接了吻。

detailed_translations.english: to touch someone with your lips as a greeting, to show them love, or as part of a sexual relationship
to touch someone with your lips as a greeting, to show them love, or as part of a sexual relationship
an act of kissing

name: Moon
trans: n. 月亮；月球；月光；卫星 vi. 闲荡；出神 vt. 虚度 n. (Moon)人名；(瑞典)莫恩；(柬)蒙；(英)穆恩；(缅)孟

name: forest
trans: n. 森林，林区；（森林似的）一丛；皇家林地，御猎场 v. 植林于；被森林覆盖 n. (Forest) 福雷斯特（人名）

sentences.english: a tropical forest
sentences.chinese: 热带森林

sentences.english: the danger of forest fires
sentences.chinese: 发生森林火灾的危险

detailed_translations.english: a large area of land that is covered with trees

name: frog
trans: n. 青蛙；[铁路] 辙叉；饰扣 vi. 捕蛙 n. (Frog)人名；(俄)弗罗格

sentences.english: The tadpole has become a frog.
sentences.chinese: 这个蝌蚪已长成青蛙。

sentences.english: A tadpole metamorphoses into a frog.
sentences.chinese: 蝌蚪会变成青蛙。

sentences.english: The frog darted out its tongue to catch a mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 这只青蛙突然伸出舌头捕捉蚊子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 青蛙；[铁路] 辙叉；饰扣
detailed_translations.english: a small green animal that lives near water and has long legs for jumping

name: insect
trans: n. 昆虫；卑鄙的人

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

name: leaf
trans: n. 叶子；（书籍等的）一张；扇页 vi. 生叶；翻书页 vt. 翻…的页，匆匆翻阅 n. (Leaf)人名；(英)利夫

sentences.english: a flowering bush with large shiny leaves
sentences.chinese: 叶子大而油亮的开花灌木

detailed_translations.chinese: 叶子；（书籍等的）一张；扇页
detailed_translations.english: one of the flat green parts of a plant that are joined to its stem or branches

name: lizard
trans: n. 蜥蜴；类蜥蜴爬行动物 n. (Lizard)人名；(法)利扎尔

sentences.english: Neither the lizard nor the glass has any secrets.
sentences.chinese: 无论是蜥蜴还是玻璃，都没有任何秘密。

sentences.english: A lizard will regenerate its tail if it's cut off.
sentences.chinese: 蜥蜴的尾巴如被切掉，它会重新生出一条尾巴。

sentences.english: Meetings are just one symptom of anorganization run by the lizard brain.
sentences.chinese: 会海只是这类靠蜥蜴脑运作的组织的一个症状。

detailed_translations.english: a type of reptile that has four legs and a long tail

name: moss
trans: n. 苔藓；泥沼 vt. 使长满苔藓 n. (Moss)人名；(英、德、意、西、葡、波、挪、瑞典)莫斯

sentences.english: ...ground covered over with moss.
sentences.chinese: …长满青苔的地面。

detailed_translations.english: a very small green plant that grows in a thick soft furry mass on wet soil, trees, or rocks

name: snake
trans: n. 蛇；阴险的人 vi. 迂回前进 vt. 拉（木材等）；迂回前进

sentences.english: A snake slithered across our path.
sentences.chinese: 一条蛇蜿蜒爬过我们的小路。

detailed_translations.english: an animal with a long thin body and no legs, that often has a poisonous bite
if a river, road, train, or line snakes somewhere, it moves in long twisting curves

name: bathtub
trans: n. 浴缸

sentences.english: Clean out the bathtub when you are done.
sentences.chinese: 洗完澡后请把浴缸洗干净。

sentences.english: His students are generally much better at bathtub dynamics by the end of his course, which gives him hope.
sentences.chinese: 在完成他的课程之后，他的学生对浴缸动力学的理解普遍好多了，这给了他希望。

sentences.english: And the neighbor down the street found in the bathtub… And the kid who ran his motorcycle into a tree an accident but for the note left behind saying that's exactly what he intended to do… And so on.
sentences.chinese: 还有那个街上的邻居，被人发现在浴缸里自杀了……还记着有个小年轻骑摩托车撞到了树上，大家认为这是个意外，但是这个小孩留的字条上说他是一心寻死的，等等。

detailed_translations.english: a long large container that you fill with water and sit or lie in to wash yourself

name: grass
trans: n. 草；草地，草坪 vt. 放牧；使……长满草；使……吃草 vi. 长草 n. (Grass)人名；(法、德、俄、瑞典、英)格拉斯

sentences.english: I walked across the grass.
sentences.chinese: 我走在草地上。

sentences.english: Keep off the grass.
sentences.chinese: 请勿践踏草地。

detailed_translations.english: an area of grass, especially an area where the grass is kept cut short

name: in

trans: v. 微笑；微笑着表示；露出（某种笑容） n. 微笑，笑容；喜色 n. (Smile) （俄、印度、美）斯米莱（人名）

name: tuck

trans: n. 声音；嗓音；发言权；愿望 vt. 表达；吐露

name: line
trans: n. 路线，航线；排；绳 vt. 排成一行；划线于；以线条标示；使…起皱纹 vi. 排队；站成一排 n. (Line)人名；(英)莱恩；(俄)利涅

name: screen

sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

trans: n. 沐浴；浴室；浴盆 vt. 洗澡 vi. 洗澡

sentences.chinese: 用肥皂和水彻底洗一洗。

糖果（等于sweets）；冰糖（等于sugar candy，rock candy）；毒品

sentences.chinese: 我宁愿在花园里锄草，不愿在运动场上跑来跑去。

name: clothes
trans: n. 衣服

sentences.english: What sort of clothes was he wearing?
sentences.chinese: 他穿着什么样的衣服？

sentences.english: I showered and put on clean clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我淋浴后穿上干净的衣服。

sentences.english: He was still in his work clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然穿着工作服。

sentences.english: a clothes shop
sentences.chinese: 服装店

detailed_translations.english: the things that people wear to cover their body or keep warm

name: grandparent
trans: n. 祖父母；祖父或祖母；外祖父母；外祖父或外祖母

sentences.english: My grandparents live in Sussex.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母住在萨塞克斯郡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 祖父母；祖父或祖母；外祖父母；外祖父或外祖母
detailed_translations.english: one of the parents of your mother or father

name: map
trans: n. 地图；天体图；示意图，分布图；染色体图；（非正式）面孔 v. 绘制地图；了解信息；计划；映现；映射；与……有关；确定基因在染色体中的位置 n. (Map) （美）马普（人名）

sentences.english: He spent the next fifteen years mapping the Isle of Anglesey.
sentences.chinese: 他在后来的十五年里绘制了安格尔西岛的地图。

detailed_translations.chinese: 映射；计划；绘制地图；确定基因在染色体中的位置
detailed_translations.english: to make a map of a particular area
a drawing of a particular area, for example a city or country, which shows its main features, such as its roads, rivers, mountains etc

name: seatbelt
trans: n. 座位安全带

sentences.english: Data typically collected includes speed at time of impact, steering angle, whether brakes were applied, and seatbelt usage during the crash.
sentences.chinese: 主要收集的数据包括受到影响时的速度，方向盘角度，是否踩了刹车，以及撞车时安全带使用情况。

sentences.english: But, like wearing a seatbelt in a car, cancer prevention can reduce the risks and the numbers of people who end up with the disease.
sentences.chinese: 但是，就像在汽车里系上安全带一样，癌症预防能够减少患癌症的风险，并且降低该病的死亡率。

sentences.english: Volvo was the first automobile manufacturer to offer the modern seatbelt as a permanent addition to its cars.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔沃公司是世界上第一家将现代安全带作为汽车永久部件的汽车公司。

name: suitcase
trans: n. [轻] 手提箱；衣箱

sentences.english: It did not take Andrew long to pack a suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁没有用多长时间就整理好了手提箱。

detailed_translations.english: a large case with a handle, used for carrying clothes and possessions when you travel

name: umbrella
trans: n. 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构

sentences.english: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.english: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.chinese: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构
detailed_translations.english: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.

name: under
trans: prep. 在……下面；在……表面下；在……的后面；（职务、级别）低于；少于；比……年轻；由……控制；根据；在……过程中；受……影响；承受着；以（某一名字）；在……项下；在（某个系统）下；在……期间；在……生存条件下；栽有；在……掌权期间；在……手下工作 adv. 在下面；在水下；少于；较年轻；在昏迷中； adj. 较低的；下面的

sentences.english: These toys are not suitable for children under five.
sentences.chinese: 这些玩具不适合五岁以下的儿童玩。

sentences.english: Most of the events listed cost under £60.
sentences.chinese: 所列活动项目的花费大多低于 60 英镑。

sentences.english: I spend just under four hours a day seeing customers.
sentences.chinese: 我一天接待客户所花的时间将近四小时。

sentences.english: He took a deep breath before he went under.
sentences.chinese: 他在钻下水前深深地吸了口气。

detailed_translations.english: less than a particular number, amount, age, or price
Under is also an adverb

name: chocolate
trans: n. 巧克力，巧克力糖；巧克力色 adj. 巧克力色的；巧克力口味的 n. (Chocolate)人名；(葡)绍科拉特

sentences.english: a chocolate bar
sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.english: I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.english: a box of chocolates
sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

detailed_translations.english: a sweet brown food that you can eat as a sweet or use in cooking to give foods such as cakes a special sweet taste

name: valentine
trans: n. 情人；情人节礼物

sentences.english: Be my valentine.
sentences.chinese: 做我的情人吧。

detailed_translations.english: someone you love or think is attractive, that you send a card to on St Valentine’s Day

name: ice
trans: n. 冰；冰淇淋；矜持；（俚）钻石 vt. 冰镇；结冰 vi. 结冰 adj. 冰的 n. (Ice)人名；(英)艾斯；(法)伊斯

name: river
trans: n. 河，江 n. (River)人名；(英)里弗

sentences.english: the Mississippi River
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河

sentences.english: the River Thames
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河

detailed_translations.english: a natural and continuous flow of water in a long line across a country into the sea

name: snow
trans: n. 雪，积雪；下雪 vi. 降雪 vt. 使纷纷落下；使变白 n. (Snow)人名；(英)斯诺

sentences.english: Snow was falling heavily as we entered the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们进村的时候雪下得正大。

sentences.english: I could see footprints in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我看到雪地里有脚印。

sentences.english: The town was buried under three feet of snow.
sentences.chinese: 小镇被三英尺厚的积雪覆盖着。

detailed_translations.english: soft white pieces of frozen water that fall from the sky in cold weather and cover the ground
if it snows, snow falls from the sky

name: draw
trans: vt. 画；拉；吸引 vi. 拉；拖 n. 平局；抽签 n. (Draw)人名；(英)德劳

sentences.english: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.english: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.chinese: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.english: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.chinese: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
sentences.chinese: 我从来就画不好图画。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc

name: drill
trans: n. 训练；钻孔机；钻子；播种机；演习 vi. 钻孔；训练 vt. 钻孔；训练；条播 n. (Drill)人名；(德、英)德里尔

sentences.english: an electric drill
sentences.chinese: 电钻

sentences.english: rifle drill
sentences.chinese: 步枪操练

sentences.english: Drill a hole in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 在每个角上钻一个孔。

detailed_translations.english: a tool or machine used for making holes in something
to make a hole in something using a drill

name: glue
trans: n. 胶，胶水 v. （用胶水）粘合；（非正式）专注于

sentences.english: a tube of glue
sentences.chinese: 一管胶水

sentences.english: The sheets are glued together with strong adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 薄板用强力胶粘在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a sticky substance used for joining things together
to join two things together using glue

name: hammer
trans: n. 锤子；链球；击锤；锤骨；音槌；沉重打击 v. 锤击；反复敲打；击球；轻松击溃；灌输；（非正式）严厉批评；（股票交易）宣布（某人或公司）无力偿债 n. (Hammer) （美、德、挪、奥、俄、丹、加、巴）阿梅（人名）

sentences.english: The rain was hammering against the window.
sentences.chinese: 雨点不停地敲打着窗户。

detailed_translations.english: to hit something many times, especially making a loud noise
a tool with a heavy metal part on a long handle, used for hitting nails into wood
to hit something with a hammer in order to force it into a particular position or shape

name: hang
trans: vt. 悬挂，垂下；装饰；绞死；使悬而未决 vi. 悬着，垂下；被绞死；悬而不决 n. 悬挂；暂停，中止 n. (Hang)人名；(罗)汉格；(东南亚国家华语)康；(老)汉；(柬)韩(用于名字第一节)，杭

sentences.english: Philip hung his coat on a hook behind the door.
sentences.chinese: 菲利普把自己的大衣挂在门后的钩子上。

sentences.english: She hung the sheets on the washing line.
sentences.chinese: 她把床单晾在晒衣绳上。

detailed_translations.chinese: [hung-hung] 悬挂， 吊； 徘徊； [hanged-hanged] 吊
detailed_translations.english: to put something in a position so that the top part is fixed or supported, and the bottom part is free to move and does not touch the ground

name: saw
trans: n. 锯；格言 v. 锯；锯成；用锯；乱剪；拉锯似的来回移动 v. 看见；明白，了解（see 的过去式）

sentences.english: The only tools in the house are a hammer and a saw.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里仅有的工具是一把锤子和一把锯。

sentences.english: She was in the back yard sawing logs.
sentences.chinese: 她在后院锯木头。

detailed_translations.english: a tool that you use for cutting wood. It has a flat blade with an edge cut into many V shapes.
to cut something using a saw

name: drive
trans: v. 开车；（机动车）被驾驶；拥有……汽车；开车送某人；推动；钉；开凿；驱赶；迫使，逼迫；激励；挖掘；猛击（球）；吹，刮；猛落；围赶（猎物）；使（抽象事物）发生或发展 n. 驱车旅行，驾车路程；传动装置；驱动器；（人的）强烈欲望；魄力，内驱力；（有组织的）活动；快车道；猛抽；（对牲口的）驱赶；猛击，大规模攻击；玩纸牌的聚会

sentences.english: Can you drive?
sentences.chinese: 你会开车吗？

sentences.english: We watched Dad drive the posts into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着爸爸把木桩打入地里。

sentences.english: With a few loud whistles, they drove the donkeys out of the enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 随着几声响亮的哨声，他们把驴子赶出了围栏。

detailed_translations.english: to make a car, truck, bus etc move along

name: spot
trans: n. 地点；斑点 vt. 认出；弄脏；用灯光照射 vi. 沾上污渍；满是斑点 adj. 现场的；现货买卖的 adv. 准确地；恰好

sentences.english: a nice quiet spot on the beach
sentences.chinese: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.english: I chose a spot well away from the road.
sentences.chinese: 我选了一个远离马路的地点。

detailed_translations.english: a particular place or area, especially a pleasant place where you spend time

detailed_translations.chinese: 认出， 发现； 玷污
detailed_translations.english: to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize

name: tool
trans: n. 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段 vi. 使用工具；用机床装备工厂 vt. 用工具给……加工

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

name: igloo
trans: n. 圆顶建筑；雪块砌成的圆顶小屋；冰屋；爱斯基摩人圆顶小屋

sentences.english: Defining the town center of Râmnicu Vâlcea is a towering shopping mall that looks like a giant glass igloo.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔恰市中心的地标性建筑是一座高耸的购物商场，它看上去就像是一座巨型的玻璃圆顶建筑。

sentences.english: When you sign up, you adopt an animated penguin to chat to friends, play games, explore, collect coins and even personalise your very own igloo.
sentences.chinese: 当你注册后，你就会领养一直动画企鹅，与朋友聊天，玩游戏，探索，收集硬币，甚至个性化你自己的圆顶冰屋。

sentences.english: The next morning he and Egarter Vigl spruced up the body with a fine spray of sterilized water, which froze on contact. Then they slid the Iceman back into his high-tech igloo and closed the door.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，他和维格用一种很好的喷雾消毒水通过其冰冻接触清洁了冰人，之后将他滑进他的高科技圆顶建筑，关上门。

detailed_translations.english: Igloos are dome-shaped houses built from blocks of snow by the Inuit people

name: seal
trans: n. 密封；印章；海豹；封条；标志 vt. 密封；盖章 vi. 猎海豹 n. (Seal)人名；(英)西尔

sentences.english: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.chinese: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.english: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.english: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that has a special design and shows the legal or official authority of a person or organization
to close an entrance or a container with something that stops air, water etc from coming in or out of it

name: whale
trans: n. 鲸；巨大的东西 v. （非正式）殴打；捕鲸；使惨败 n. (Whale) （爱）惠尔（人名）

sentences.english: The receding tide stranded the whale.
sentences.chinese: 退潮把鲸鱼搁浅在海滩上。

sentences.english: So whale come out fish, because they are fish obviously.
sentences.chinese: 所以鲸鱼就是鱼，因为他们显然是鱼。

sentences.english: This sense of revelation is in part due to our changing attitude towards the whale.
sentences.chinese: 与鲸鱼感到关联部分是由于和我们对鲸鱼态度发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: a very large animal that lives in the sea and looks like a fish, but is actually a mammal

name: fire
trans: n. 火；火灾；炮火；炉火；热情；激情；磨难 vt. 点燃；解雇；开除；使发光；烧制；激动；放枪 vi. 着火；射击；开枪；激动；烧火

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

name: mittens
trans: n. 棒球手套，拳击手套；手套；连指手套（mitten的复数，常用复数）

name: sled
trans: n. 雪橇 vi. 乘雪橇；用雪橇运 vt. 用摘棉机摘；用雪橇运

sentences.english: She tumbled over a sled.
sentences.chinese: 她被雪橇绊了一跤。

sentences.english: When his sled broke down, he repaired it.
sentences.chinese: 当他的雪橇坏掉时，他自己维修。

sentences.english: The hut stands at the foot of a near vertical wall of rock in an icy fjord in the high Arctic, a week away by dog sled from the nearest human settlement.
sentences.chinese: 小屋坐落在高纬度北极地区峡湾边一座几乎是垂直的山岩下，从最近的有人居住的地方到此地，狗拉的雪橇要走一个星期。

detailed_translations.english: A sled is the same as a

name: snowman
trans: n. 雪人 n. (Snowman)人名；(英)斯诺曼

sentences.english: The children were balling up snow to make a snowman.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们正在把雪堆成球状，做一个雪人。

sentences.english: "He gave me a hug and a kiss and asked me where my snowman was," she said.
sentences.chinese: 黛比说：“他给了我一个拥抱和亲吻。 还问我的雪人在哪里。”

sentences.english: If you are wrong,the snowman with the correct answer will chill your heart.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是错误的，有正确答案的雪人将会使你的心脏变冷。

detailed_translations.english: a simple figure of a person made of snow, made especially by children

name: winter
trans: n. 冬季；年岁；萧条期 vi. 过冬 adj. 冬天的；越冬的 n. (Winter)人名；(英、德、匈、罗、捷、西、芬、瑞典、法)温特

sentences.english: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.english: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.english: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

detailed_translations.english: the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest

name: cab
trans: n. 驾驶室；出租汽车；出租马车 vi. 乘出租马车（或汽车）

sentences.english: New York’s yellow cabs
sentences.chinese: 纽约的黄色出租车

sentences.english: Ralph tried to hail a cab (= wave to get a cab to stop for you ) .
sentences.chinese: 拉尔夫招手想叫一辆出租车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 驾驶室；出租汽车；出租马车
detailed_translations.english: a taxi

name: sign
trans: n. 迹象；符号；记号；手势；指示牌 vi. 签署；签名 vt. 签署；示意

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

name: vest
trans: n. 背心；汗衫 vt. 授予；使穿衣 vi. 归属；穿衣服 n. (Vest)人名；(英)维斯特；(匈)韦什特

sentences.english: a bulletproof vest
sentences.chinese: 防弹背心

detailed_translations.english: a piece of underwear without sleeves that you wear on the top half of your body
